content: Hello, currently rust-analyzer and rls doesn't do the right thing with the autocomplete within use. When i try to write use xxx::macro_foo; auto complete will add extra ! and parenthesis, which is not at all what i want. I wonder if it's possible to do some "context analysis" and provide different completions in this case.
Oh really! Maybe my build is a bit outdated. Let me build the newest commit and try again.
Yes! the newer version works just as expected, thank you!
